name: Classification-using-knn
body: # Classification-using-KNN with Matlab. Applying KNN on IRIS dataset. Sample output - Accuracy is 0.866667 percent for 1 neighbours Accuracy is 0.888889 percent for 2 neighbours Accuracy is 0.888889 percent for 3 neighbours Accuracy is 0.911111 percent for 4 neighbours Accuracy is 0.911111 percent for 5 neighbours Accuracy is 0.911111 percent for 6 neighbours Accuracy is 0.933333 percent for 7 neighbours
